00074                 static const double UNDEFINED_INSTANT;
00075

00077                 double begin;

00085                             string id,

00087                             ContentAnchor* anchor);
00088

00097                             long repetitions, double repetitionInterval);
00098 
00099                 double getBegin();

00103   };
00104 }
